channel.title: LSTM on Nithin Premkumar
channel.description: Recent content in LSTM on Nithin Premkumar

item.title: Project 1: Movie Genre Classifier
item.description: Final Year Undergraduate Project, worked in a team of four and coordinated the team in the project. Created a bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) Model to classify into top five genres: thrillers, Crime Fiction, Romance, Action, and Short films. The data used for the project was from the CMU Movie Summary Corpus (http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~ark/personas/) collected by David Bamman, Brendan O’Connor, and Noah Smith at the Language Technologies Institute and Machine Learning Department at Carnegie Mellon University.
